page.description: Opens the Circular Progress Indicator Genie.

prototypes.prototype: dim settingsJSON as C = a5wcb_circularProgressBuilder([C json [, C ph [, L flagPromptForDiv [, C controls ]]]])

description.p: JSON object containing the settings for the builder. The settings in this object will overwrite the default settings for the builder.
Returns the settings JSON for the builder. This JSON can be passed as the first argument into *[xb:a5wcb_circularProgressBuilder()]* to populate the properties for the builder.

discussion.p: The display of the progress indicator is highly configurable. For example, you can:

item.name: Set the color of the 'completed' section of the bar. You can create a complex color definition that automatically uses different values for the color depending on the completed value
Set the color of the 'uncompleted' section of the bar
Set the size of the control
Set the width of the control
Indicate if the value should be shown in text in the center of the control

Specify the start angle for the start and end value. In the examples shown below, the first control starts at -90 degrees and ends at 270 degrees and the second example shown below starts at -180 degrees and ends at 90 degrees.
Specify if the control has a label. In the second example shown below, the label is 'Label'.

discussion.p: The genie helps define the appearance of the circular progress indicator. It includes a button to generate the JavaScript to display the control.
